sptlrpc_flavor Struct Reference
[sptlrpc]

Full description of flavors being used on a ptlrpc connection, include both regular RPC and bulk transfer parts. More...

Detailed Description

Full description of flavors being used on a ptlrpc connection, include both regular RPC and bulk transfer parts.
